data.title: Dries van Agt, the prime minister who “would love” to be the governor of Limburg
data.meta_description: Former Prime Minister Dries van Agt (93) passed away “hand in hand” with his wife Eugenie, a native of Maastricht, on Monday. The CDA member would have become g
data.text:
Summary by De Limburger

Former Prime Minister Dries van Agt (93) passed away “hand in hand” with his wife Eugenie, a native of Maastricht, on Monday. The CDA member would have become governor in Limburg instead of prime minister in 1977, but national politics called.

Dries van Agt, the prime minister who “would love” to be the governor of Limburg

Former Prime Minister Dries van Agt (93) passed away “hand in hand” with his wife Eugenie, a native of Maastricht, on Monday. The CDA member would have become governor in Limburg instead of prime minister in 1977, but national politics called.

5 months ago·Maastricht, Netherlands
